description: This lightened up beef stroganoff replaces sour cream with light creme fraiche but has all the flavour of the traditional dish.
name: Beef Stroganoff with Herbed Cauliflower Rice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a large frying pan on a medium high heat, drizzle the oil and cook the onion for 5 minutes until softened. Add the paprika, mushrooms and garlic and cook for 5 more minutes, stirring occasionally.
Increase the heat and add the vinegar and mustard, stirring to coat. Cook for 2 minutes and pour over the beef stock, cook for 5 minutes until reduced.
Add the steak slices and cook for 2-3 minutes. Reduce the heat to low and stir in the creme fraiche and gherkins, cook gently for 2 more minutes. Season to taste.
In a food processor, pulse the cauliflower and half the parsley to achieve a rice like consistency. Season, pour into a bowl and microwave on high for 3 minutes.
Spoon the cauliflower rice on to plates, top with the stroganoff and serve with the remaining parsley sprinkled on top.
